eu.stratosphere.nephele.configuration

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.nephele.configuration.Configuration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.esotericsoftware.kryo.KryoSerializable

    public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.esotericsoftware.kryo.KryoSerializable
    Lightweight configuration object which can store key/value pairs. Configuration objects can be extracted from or integrated into the GlobalConfiguration object. They can be transported via Nephele's IPC system to distribute configuration data at runtime. This class is thread-safe.
    Author:
    warneke

      • getClass

        public <T> java.lang.Class<T> getClass(java.lang.String key,
                                       java.lang.Class<? extends T> defaultValue,
                                       java.lang.Class<T> ancestor)
        Returns the class associated with the given key as a string.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the ancestor of both the default value and the potential value
        Parameters:
        key - the key pointing to the associated value
        defaultValue - the optional default value returned if no entry exists
        ancestor - the ancestor of both the default value and the potential value
        Returns:
        the (default) value associated with the given key
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the class identified by the associated value cannot be resolved
        See Also:
        setClass(String, Class)

      • setClass

        public void setClass(java.lang.String key,
                     java.lang.Class<?> klazz)
        Adds the given key/value pair to the configuration object. The class can be retrieved by invoking getClass(String, Class, Class) if it is in the scope of the class loader on the caller.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the pair to be added
        klazz - the value of the pair to be added
        See Also:
        getClass(String, Class), getClass(String, Class, Class)

      • setString

        public void setString(java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.String value)
        Adds the given key/value pair to the configuration object. If either the key or the value is null the pair is not added.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the key/value pair to be added
        value - the value of the key/value pair to be added

      • addAll

        public void addAll(Configuration other,
                   java.lang.String prefix)
        Adds all entries from the given configuration into this configuration. The keys are prepended with the given prefix.
        Parameters:
        other - The configuration whose entries are added to this configuration.
        prefix - The prefix to prepend.
